name: Netmera-iOS-SDK
summary: iOS SDK for Netmera mobile app engagement platform.
description:
Know & understand your app users, send them to the point push notification & popup campaigns, and analyze results with Netmera!
Netmera iOS SDK is a mobile app engagement platform with features:

 - Push Notifications : Netmera allows you to send various types of push notifications including:
     - Standard push notifications.
     - Rich push notifications that enables you to provide dynamic rich content to users.
     - Interactive push notifications to get immediate actions from push notification message without even opening the app.
 - Segments & Targets : Netmera helps you by targeting users according to their in-app user behaviors, tags and location.
 - App Analytics : Netmera collects default app analytics like app install, app open/close, time passed in the app etc. in addition to custom events reported by you.
 - Push Analytics : Analyze success of your push notifications by comparing changes in users' behaviors after push notifications.
